mapper.select: SELECT RES.RES_CD FROM RESERVATION_TB RES JOIN ROOM_TB ROOM ON RES.ROOM_NO = ROOM.ROOM_SQ WHERE RES.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND ROOM.ACCOM_NO = #{accomNo} AND RES.CK_RES_ST = 'COMPLETED' ORDER BY RES.RES_CD DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT V.*, M.MEM_NICK, R.ROOM_NO, RM.ACCOM_NO FROM REVIEW_TB V JOIN RESERVATION_TB R ON V.RES_CD = R.RES_CD JOIN ROOM_TB RM ON R.ROOM_NO = RM.ROOM_SQ JOIN MEMBER_TB M ON R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_SQ WHERE RM.ACCOM_NO = #{accomSq} ORDER BY V.REV_REG_DT DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT V.REV_SQ, V.REV_SCO, V.REV_CONT, M.MEM_NICK FROM REVIEW_TB V JOIN RESERVATION_TB R ON V.RES_CD = R.RES_CD JOIN ROOM_TB RM ON R.ROOM_NO = RM.ROOM_SQ JOIN MEMBER_TB M ON R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_SQ WHERE RM.ACCOM_NO = #{accomNo} ORDER BY V.REV_REG_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM REVIEW_IMAGE_TB WHERE REV_NO = #{revSq} ORDER BY REV_IMG_SQ ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_TB WHERE RES_CD = #{resCd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_TB V JOIN RESERVATION_TB R ON V.RES_CD = R.RES_CD JOIN ROOM_TB RM ON R.ROOM_NO = RM.ROOM_SQ WHERE RM.ACCOM_NO = #{accomSq}
SELECT NVL(AVG(REV_SCO), 0) FROM REVIEW_TB V JOIN RESERVATION_TB R ON V.RES_CD = R.RES_CD JOIN ROOM_TB RM ON R.ROOM_NO = RM.ROOM_SQ WHERE RM.ACCOM_NO = #{accomNo}
